enabled.desc: Enable or disable the custom scoreboard

appearance.desc: Edit this list to change the order of appearance of the scoreboard.

events.desc: Edit this list to change the order of appearance of the events.

tablist_lines.desc: Select Tablist Lines which will be able to be selected in the "Appearance" list and rendered inbetween Scoreboard lines.

scale.desc: Choose the scale of the scoreboard.

title_options.desc: Edit the title of the scoreboard.

footer_options.desc: Edit the footer of the scoreboard.

number_format.desc: Choose the format of the numbers in the scoreboard.

number_display_format.desc: Choose the format numbers with their prefix are displayed in the scoreboard.

vertical_alignment.desc: Choose the vertical alignment of the scoreboard.

horizontal_alignment.desc: Choose the horizontal alignment of the scoreboard.

hide_when_tab.desc: Hide the Custom Scoreboard while the tablist is open.

hide_when_chat.desc: Hide the Custom Scoreboard while the chat is open.

hide_hypixel.desc: Enable or disable the Hypixel scoreboard.

text_shadow.desc: Enable or disable the text shadow on the scoreboard.

custom_lines.desc: Instead of displaying the Hypixel's scoreboard lines, it will display the custom lines you selected in appearance & events.

desc: Show the Custom Scoreboard outside SkyBlock.
If enabled, it will use that servers lines without adding any other special lines.

show_active_only.desc: Hides Elements where the currency of the line is zero (like having no Purse) or other lines like the Booster Cookie Line if no cookie is active.

desc: If enabled, the custom lines will render inside the Scoreboard Overhaul scoreboard.
First line of the appearance option will be used as the title, no more no less.
§cThis will only work inside SkyBlock. Click and hover actions, aswell as padding, marging, background, etc. wont work on them.

alignment.desc: Choose the alignment of the title and footer.

use_custom_text.desc: Enable or disable custom text for the title and footer.

custom_text.desc: Edit the custom text for the title and footer. Use && for colors and \n for new line.

enabled.desc: Enable or disable the background of the scoreboard.

color.desc: Choose the color of the background.

padding.desc: Choose the padding of the background.

margin.desc: Choose the margin between the scoreboard and the screen border.

radius.desc: Choose the radius of the rounded corner of the background.

image.desc:
Use a custom image as the background.
Make sure you have your texturepack enabled.

transparency.desc: Choose the transparency of the background.

website.desc: Click to open a website that helps you generate your own background texturepack. Make sure to enable the 'Modern CustomScoreboard' option.

editor.desc: Click to open the custom background image editor.

date_format.desc: Choose the format of the date in the scoreboard.

bits_available.desc: Show your available bits on the scoreboard.

colored_month.desc: Show the month in color on the scoreboard.

profile_name.desc: Show your profile name on the scoreboard.

mayor_time.desc: Show the time till the next mayor election on the scoreboard.

mayor_perks.desc: Show the perks of the mayor on the scoreboard.

mayor_minister.desc: Show the minister on the scoreboard.

jerry_minister.@value: Show Extra Jerry Mayor as Minister
jerry_minister.desc: The extra Jerry mayor will behave exactly like a minister in the scoreboard.

all_events.desc: Show all events instead of the first one. Uses the "Events Priority" list.

hypixel_title.desc: Use Hypixel's Scoreboard Title. §cWill override the Custom Title if enabled.

party_everywhere.desc: Show the party on every Island instead of just Glacite Tunnels, Dungeon Hub and Crimson Isle.

max_party.desc: Show the max party size on the scoreboard.

party_leader.desc: Show the party leader on the scoreboard.

separators_start_end.@value: Hide Separators at Start and End
separators_start_end.desc: Hide the separators at the start and end of the scoreboard.

color_arrow.desc: Color the Arrow Line based on the amount of arrows left.

arrow_display.desc: Choose the display type of the arrows.

piggy.desc: Use "Piggy" instead of "Purse" as your Purse prefix when a piggy bank is active.

bank_always_compact.desc: Makes the Bank element ignore the main Number Format option, and always shows shortened (like in tablist).

pet_max.desc:
Show "Max" when the pet is at max level.
When disabled, the level will be hidden.

magical_power.desc: Show your Magical Power next to selected power.

slayer_level.desc: Show your Slayer Level in the Slayer Stats Line

powder_display.desc: Choose the format to display Hotm Powder / Hotf Whispers.

hypixel_powder.desc: Show Hypixel's Powder/Whisper Line on the scoreboard.

pet_prefix.desc: Add "Pet:" as a prefix/suffix to the pet line.

time_24h_format.desc: Shows the SkyBlock time in 24h format instead of 12h.

smooth_time.desc:
Show the individual minutes of the current SkyBlock time instead of only updating every ~8 seconds.
Will turn off if the smoothing is too inaccurate
